ovdesc.p: This table used to allocate the queue in collection item's table

desc.p: User can desire to set flag whether particular queue can active or inactive for a centain period.
External Agency who handles the queue.
Branch of the agency that handles the queue.
When a queue is based on selection, it is assigned with a priority to be used in case of different queues are sharing same criteria.
Name or number of the field in the file COLLECTION ITEM to be used as selection criteria for this queue.
The value entered in this field should be compliant with the field entered in “ITEM FIELD”.
The value entered in this field should be compliant with the field entered in “ITEM FIELD".
And/or operator (selection can be based on many fields).
Number of days for any item in this queue without any action to be considered as inactive.
The outcome to be applied to items falling under the condition specified in the previous field.
